<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Mapbox Starter
</h1>

super simple mapbox example / starter for GatsbyJS. One example is used to show how to render GeoJSON data from a 3rd party API.

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Setup your Environment Variables.**

Create an `.env` file and add your MAPBOX_API_KEY.

> Don't have an API key, visit [Mapbox](https://account.mapbox.com/) to grab yours.

2.  **Install Packages.**

    Navigate into your new siteâ€™s directory and run:

    ```shell
    yarn
    // or npm i
    ```

3.  **Run Your Site**

    ```shell
    yarn dev
    // or npm run dev
    ```

    Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!
